rukus.text: Dhbansa sihamtara babe yihamte jokha-makhata kama diye
yihamte anara paraa mapi la'omte purnamatraata grahana karae
arau yetiya sihamtaka mapi diye athaba ojana karai diye, tetiya kama diye
Sihamte bisbasa nakarae neki ye, sihamta puranaraut'thita ha’ba
mahadirasata
Yidina sakalo manuhe bisbajagatara pratipalakara sanmukhata thiya ha’ba
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya papisakalara amalanama chijjinata ache
Arau kihe tomaka janaba chijjina ki
cihnita amalanama
Se'idina dhbansa asbikarakaraisakalara babe
yihamte pratidana dirasaka asbikara karae
Arau kerala pratyeka papistha simalanghanakaraira bahirae ana kone'o iyaka asbikara nakarae
Arau yetiya amara ayatasamuha tara ocarata tilarata karaa haya tetiya si kaya, (eya haiche) ‘purbarartisakalara upakatha’
Ketiya'o nahaya, sihamtara karmara phalata sihamtara antarata mamara dharaiche
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya sihamta se'idina nija pratipalakara paraa pardara amrata thakiba
Tara pichata niscaya sihamte prajjbalita jahannamata praraesa karaiba
tara pichata koraa ha’ba, ‘e'itorae se'ito yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya punyabanalokasakalara amalanama thakiba illiyyinata
Arau kihe tomaka janaba illiyyina ki
cihnita amalanama
Sannidhyapraaptasakale'i iyara abalokana karae
Niscaya punyabanasakale'i thakiba parama sukha-santita
susajjita asanata bahi darsana karaiba
Tumi sihamtara mukhamandalata sukha-santira ujjalata dekhibalai paba
sihamtaka mohara marai thoraa bisud'dha paniya pana karaoraa ha’ba
arau yara mohara ha'ba michakara, seye e'i bisaye pratiyogisakale pratiyogita karaa ucita
Arau iyara misrana ha’ba tachanimara
(se'ito) eta nijaraa, yara paraa sannidhyasakale pana karaiba
Niscaya yihamte aparaadha karaiche sihamte muminasakalaka upahasa karaichila
arau yetiya sihamte muminasakalara ocaraedi gaichila tetiya sihamte caku tipi bidraupa karaichila
Arau yetiya sihamte aponajanara ocaralai ubhati ahichila tetiya utphallita hai ubhatichila
arau sihamte yetiya muminasakalaka dekhichila tetiya kaichila, ‘niscaya ihamta pathabhrasta’
Athaca sihamtaka muminasakalara tattbabadhayaka hicape pathoraa horaa na'i
Eteke aji muminasakale upahasa karaiba kaphirasakalaka
Susajjita asanata bahi sihamte ca'i thakiba
Kaphirasakale sihamtara krtakarmara phala palene
